description:
Jonouchi discovers that Esper Roba’s extrasensory perception is a hoax, but he’s not yet free from Esper`s mental manipulations!  Esper Roba’s Jinzo not only slaughters all of Jonouchi’s monsters, but it grows in power every turn!  Jonouchi’s luck has come to an end… or has it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuuki Aru Kake Maware Roulette Spider
勇気ある賭け 廻れルーレットスパイダー
